snippet: Police detectives said that Natalie Keepers helped plot the killing of a 13-year-old because she was excited by the secret bond she shared with her classmate.
abstract: Detective Ryan Hite of Blacksburg, Va, police force testifies in trial of former Virginia Tech freshman Natalie Keepers, on murder and kidnapping charges; Keepers allegedly helped classmate David Eisenhauer kill 13-year-old Nicole Madison Lovell and hide her body.
lead_paragraph: Police detectives said that Natalie Keepers helped plot the killing of a 13-year-old because she was excited by the secret bond she shared with her classmate.

headline.main: Virginia Tech Student Charged in Girl’s Death Called Herself ‘Sociopath in Training’
headline.print_headline: Digital Trail Is Retraced After Killing  of Girl, 13
